00143 class CIccMultiProcessElement
00144 {
00145 public:
00146   CIccMultiProcessElement() {}
00147 
00148   virtual ~CIccMultiProcessElement() {}
00149   
00150   static CIccMultiProcessElement* Create(icElemTypeSignature sig);
00151 
00152   virtual CIccMultiProcessElement *NewCopy() const = 0;
00153 
00154   virtual icElemTypeSignature GetType() const = 0;
00155   virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const = 0;
00156 
00157   virtual icUInt16Number NumInputChannels() const { return m_nInputChannels; }
00158   virtual icUInt16Number NumOutputChannels() const { return m_nOutputChannels; }
00159 
00160   virtual bool IsSupported() { return true; }
00161 
00162   virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription) = 0;
00163 
00164   virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO) = 0;
00165   virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO) = 0;
00166 
00167   virtual bool Begin(icElemInterp nIterp=icElemInterpLinear, CIccTagMultiProcessElement *pMPE=NULL) = 0;
00168 
00169   virtual CIccApplyMpe* GetNewApply(CIccApplyTagMpe *pApplyTag);
00170   virtual void Apply(CIccApplyMpe *pApply, icFloatNumber *pDestPixel, const icFloatNumber *pSrcPixel) const = 0;
00171 
00172   virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccTagMultiProcessElement* pMPE=NULL) const = 0;
00173 
00174   //Future Acs Expansion Element Accessors
00175   virtual bool IsAcs() { return false; }
00176   virtual icAcsSignature GetBAcsSig() { return icSigAcsZero; }
00177   virtual icAcsSignature GetEAcsSig() { return icSigAcsZero; }
00178 
00179   // Allow MPE objects to be extended and get extended object type.
00180   virtual IIccExtensionMpe *GetExtension() { return NULL; }
00181 
00182   //All elements start with a reserved value.  Allocate a place to put it.
00183   icUInt32Number m_nReserved;
00184 
00185 protected:
00186   icUInt16Number m_nInputChannels;
00187   icUInt16Number m_nOutputChannels;
00188 };

00197 class CIccApplyMpe
00198 {
00199 public:
00200   CIccApplyMpe(CIccMultiProcessElement *pElem);
00201   virtual ~CIccApplyMpe();
00202 
00203   virtual icElemTypeSignature GetType() const { return icSigUnknownElemType; }
00204   virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const { return "CIccApplyMpe"; }
00205 
00206   CIccMultiProcessElement *GetElem() const { return m_pElem; }
00207 
00208   void Apply(icFloatNumber *pDestPixel, const icFloatNumber *pSrcPixel) { m_pElem->Apply(this, pDestPixel, pSrcPixel); }
00209 
00210 protected:
00211   CIccApplyTagMpe *m_pApplyTag;
00212 
00213   CIccMultiProcessElement *m_pElem;
00214 };

00224 class CIccMpeUnknown : public CIccMultiProcessElement
00225 {

00229   CIccMpeUnknown &operator=(const CIccMpeUnknown &elem);

00233   virtual icElemTypeSignature GetType() const { return m_sig; }
00234   virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const { return "CIccMpeUnknown"; }

00239 
00240   void SetType(icElemTypeSignature sig);

00244   icUInt8Number *GetData() { return m_pData; }

00252 
00253   virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccTagMultiProcessElement* pMPE=NULL) const;
00254

00272 class CIccDblPixelBuffer
00273 {
00274 public:
00275   CIccDblPixelBuffer();
00276   CIccDblPixelBuffer(const CIccDblPixelBuffer &buf);
00277   CIccDblPixelBuffer &operator=(const CIccDblPixelBuffer &buf);
00278   virtual ~CIccDblPixelBuffer();
00279 
00280   void Clean();
00281   void Reset() { m_nLastNumChannels = 0; }
00282   
00283   void UpdateChannels(icUInt16Number nNumChannels) { 
00284     m_nLastNumChannels = nNumChannels;
00285     if (nNumChannels>m_nMaxChannels) 
00286       m_nMaxChannels=nNumChannels;
00287   }
00288 
00289   bool Begin();
00290 
00291   icUInt16Number GetMaxChannels() { return m_nMaxChannels; }
00292   icFloatNumber *GetSrcBuf() { return m_pixelBuf1; }
00293   icFloatNumber *GetDstBuf() { return m_pixelBuf2; }
00294 
00295   void Switch() { icFloatNumber *tmp; tmp=m_pixelBuf2; m_pixelBuf2=m_pixelBuf1; m_pixelBuf1=tmp; }
00296 
00297   icUInt16Number GetAvailChannels() { return m_nLastNumChannels & 0x7fff; }
00298 
00299 protected:
00300   //For application
00301   icUInt16Number m_nMaxChannels;
00302   icUInt16Number m_nLastNumChannels;
00303   icFloatNumber *m_pixelBuf1;
00304   icFloatNumber *m_pixelBuf2;
00305 };

00319   virtual ~CIccApplyTagMpe();
00320 
00321   CIccTagMultiProcessElement *GetTag() { return m_pTag; }
00322 
00323   virtual bool AppendElem(CIccMultiProcessElement *pElem);
00324 
00325   CIccDblPixelBuffer *GetBuf() { return &m_applyBuf; }
00326   CIccApplyMpeList *GetList() { return m_list; }
00327 
00328   CIccApplyMpeIter begin() { return m_list->begin(); }
00329   CIccApplyMpeIter end() { return m_list->end(); }
00330 
00331 protected:
00332   CIccTagMultiProcessElement *m_pTag;
00333 
00334   //List of processing elements
00335   CIccApplyMpeList *m_list;
00336 
00337   //Pixel data for Apply 
00338   CIccDblPixelBuffer m_applyBuf;
00339 };

00348 class CIccTagMultiProcessElement : public CIccTag
00349 {
00350 public:
00351   CIccTagMultiProcessElement(icUInt16Number nInputChannels=0, icUInt16Number nOutputChannels=0);
00352   CIccTagMultiProcessElement(const CIccTagMultiProcessElement &lut);
00353   CIccTagMultiProcessElement &operator=(const CIccTagMultiProcessElement &lut);
00354   virtual CIccTag *NewCopy() const { return new CIccTagMultiProcessElement(*this);}
00355   virtual ~CIccTagMultiProcessElement();
00356 
00357   virtual bool IsSupported();
00358 
00359   virtual icTagTypeSignature GetType() { return icSigMultiProcessElementType; }
00360   virtual const icChar *GetClassName() { return "CIccTagMultiProcessElement"; }
00361 
00362   virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
00363 
00364   virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
00365   virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
00366 
00367   virtual void Attach(CIccMultiProcessElement *pElement);
00368 
00369   CIccMultiProcessElement *GetElement(int nIndex);
00370   void DeleteElement(int nIndex);
00371 
00372   virtual bool Begin(icElemInterp nInterp=icElemInterpLinear);
00373   virtual CIccApplyTagMpe *GetNewApply();
00374 
00375   virtual void Apply(CIccApplyTagMpe *pApply, icFloatNumber *pDestPixel, const icFloatNumber *pSrcPixel) const;
00376 
00377   virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccProfile* pProfile=NULL) const;
00378 
00379   icUInt16Number NumInputChannels() const { return m_nInputChannels; }
00380   icUInt16Number NumOutputChannels() const { return m_nOutputChannels; }
00381  
00382 protected:
00383   virtual void Clean();
00384   virtual void GetNextElemIterator(CIccMultiProcessElementList::iterator &itr);
00385   virtual icInt32Number ElementIndex(CIccMultiProcessElement *pElem);
00386 
00387   virtual CIccMultiProcessElementList::iterator GetFirstElem();
00388   virtual CIccMultiProcessElementList::iterator GetLastElem();
00389 
00390   icUInt16Number m_nInputChannels;
00391   icUInt16Number m_nOutputChannels;
00392 
00393   //List of processing elements
00394   CIccMultiProcessElementList *m_list;
00395 
00396   //Offsets of loaded elements
00397   icUInt32Number m_nProcElements;
00398   icPositionNumber *m_position;
00399 
00400   //Number of Buffer Channels needed
00401   icUInt16Number m_nBufChannels;
00402 };
